dcterms:creator: Jieyu Zhao
Tianlu Wang
Mark Yatskar
Vicente Ordonez
Kai-Wei Chang
dcterms:description: A dataset used to explore gender bias in coreference resolution, which served as inspiration for generating an Ethnicity and Top 20 Occupations corpus.
dcterms:title: WinoBias

dcterms:creator: Daniel de Vassimon Manela
David Errington
Thomas Fisher
Boris van Breugel
Pasquale Minervini
dcterms:description: A corpus derived from WinoBias, focusing on quantifying gender bias in pre-trained and fine-tuned language models, specifically in the context of occupational-ethnic biases.
dcterms:title: Ethnicity and Top 20 Occupations corpus
